info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 8:09PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...HEAVY RAIN WILL AFFECT NORTHERN BERKSHIRE...NORTHEASTERN COLUMBIA AND SOUTHEASTERN RENSSELAER COUNTIES... At 807 PM EDT, an area of heavy rain was located near Kinderhook, or near Chatham, moving northeast at 35 mph. Broad low level rotation is associated with this area of heavy rain. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, Chatham, Adams, Williamstown, Cheshire, Stephentown, New Lebanon, Valatie, Kinderhook, Hancock, New Ashford, Berkshire, Dalton, Ghent, Lanesborough, Stockport, Canaan, Windsor, East Nassau and Barkerville. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
